message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $95. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'll offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $92. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $92. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'll offer it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
